text: Kamaghɨn, kɨ purama a fozoregh, an ateghtɨma a mangam.”(23:16-17) Fofozir gumazir maba mɨgɨa ghaze, akar igharazir mam uaghan vezɨn kam iti. A kamakɨn, “Me arazir kam iti, me azeniba bar, Isar Ekiamɨn Dughiar kamɨn itima, Pailat kalabusɨn gumazir mam ataghizɨ a me bagha zui.” Nɨ Mak 15:6ɨn gan.
